content.en: QAM Signal Equalization: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the equalization of QAM signals in wireless communications. These algorithms, such as blind equalization and adaptive channel equalization techniques, have shown superior performance in terms of reducing interference, recovering phase rotation, and achieving faster convergence speed. They outperform traditional algorithms and are more robust in low signal-to-noise ratio environments, making them promising solutions for improving the performance of QAM communication systems.
content.da: QAM-signalkorrektion: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre korrektionen af QAM-signaler i trådløse kommunikationer. Disse algoritmer, såsom blind korrektion og adaptive kanalkorrektionsteknikker, har vist fremragende ydeevne med hensyn til at reducere interferens, gendanne faseforskydning og opnå hurtigere konvergenshastighed. De overgår traditionelle algoritmer og er mere robuste i miljøer med lavt signal-til-støj-forhold, hvilket gør dem til lovende løsninger for at forbedre ydeevnen af QAM-kommunikationssystemer.
